title: ISO 8601-1:2019 Time Interval by Start and End (Week Date, Extended Format)
description: A time interval identified by its start and end, using week date combined with complete local time of day in extended format [YYYY]["-"]["W"][ww]["-"][D]["T"][hh][":"[mm][":"[ss]["/"][YYYY]["-"]["W"][ww]["-"][D]["T"][hh][":"[mm][":"[ss] (ยง5.5.3.4 a, ยง5.5.3.1 b)
